title: Book Cover, "a room with a view by e m forster", 1901–50
signed: Signature printed vertically at lower right center: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed in white ink, front cover upper right: a/room/with/a view; printed in black ink, front cover lower right: e m forster.

Printed vertically in black ink, side cover:  A ROOM WITH A VIEW; printed horizontally in black ink: NC 5. Printed vertically in white ink, side cover: E M FORSTER.
description: Book cover with light green background. Front cover: at left, large stylized face; upper right: large black rectangle with white text; center right: caricature of female face in white circle. Side: vertically printed black and white text.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "a room with a view by e m forster", 1901–50.
1901–50. Thin glossy paper. Gift of Susan Lustig Peck. 2001-29-21.
